hours._text: Free refreshments, activities, craft and games

properties.title: Resurrected Bites @ St Paul's United URC

hours._text: We are open Monday mornings - 10.30-12.00 1st & 3rd Mondays is our Sewcial group - Anyone is welcome, people bring knitting, crochet etc but also some make cards, some do jigsaws, some play table tennis, and other table games and others just drink coffee and chat. Men and Women attend. 2nd & 4th Mondays - we have a fellowship group that have speakers come, some weeks there might be a beetle drive and occasionally they have lunch together. No group meets on the 5th Monday. Tuesday mornings there is a group meets between 10-12 they sing worship songs together and discuss biblical or ethical ideas. People would be welcome to come in and have a coffee even if they didn't want to join in with the group, there is space where they could come in and either have quiet time or read or chat with a friend. They only meet in term time. Wednesday our church is open for bible study from 10.00 to 11.45am much like Tuesday people would be welcome to come in, join in or find a space just to be warm.

Hot Breakfast 8.20-8.45am Monday - Saturday Hot Meal 4.30-4.50pm Monday, Wednesday, Friday (takeaway option available) Mini Super Market 4.30-4.50pm Thursdays - (an opportunity to stock up on tins and bread) Sunday Lunch 1.00-1.30pm Sundays Meals and mini supermarket produce are provided for those in need on a no questions asked basis.
